content:
Priya Sharma
Software Engineer
Email: priya.sharma@email.com | Phone: +91 9876543210

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
5 years of experience in full-stack development with expertise in Python, JavaScript, and cloud technologies.

SKILLS
- Programming: Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, SQL
- Frameworks: React, Django, FastAPI, Node.js
- Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
- Cloud: AWS, Docker, Kubernetes
- Tools: Git, JIRA, CI/CD

EXPERIENCE
Senior Software Engineer | Tech Corp | 2021-Present
- Developed microservices architecture handling 1M+ requests/day
- Led team of 4 developers
- Reduced system latency by 40%

Software Developer | StartupXYZ | 2019-2021
- Built customer-facing web applications
- Implemented RESTful APIs

EDUCATION
B.Tech Computer Science | IIT Delhi | 2019

RAHUL VERMA
Data Analyst
rahul.verma@email.com | 9812345678

Summary
3 years experience in data analysis and business intelligence. Strong in SQL and visualization tools.

Technical Skills:
- Languages: SQL, Python, R
- Tools: Tableau, Power BI, Excel
- Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL

Work Experience:

- Automated monthly reporting

Junior Analyst | DataCorp | 2021-2022

- Data cleaning and preparation

Education:
MBA (Business Analytics) | IIM Bangalore | 2021
BCom | Delhi University | 2019

Project Manager

Phone: 9988776655

Profile
PMP certified project manager with 8 years experience managing large-scale IT projects.

- Leadership and team management
- Agile/Scrum methodology

- Risk management
- Budget planning

Program Manager | Enterprise Solutions | 2020-Present

- Achieved 95% on-time delivery rate

Project Manager | IT Services Co | 2016-2020

- Improved team productivity by 30%

- Managed development team of 8

Certifications:
- PMP (Project Management Professional)
- Certified Scrum Master (CSM)
- ITIL Foundation

Education:
B.Tech IT | NIT Trichy | 2014

SNEHA PATEL | UI/UX Designer
Portfolio: snehadesigns.com
Email: sneha.patel@email.com

About Me:
Creative UI/UX designer with 4 years of experience crafting user-centered digital experiences.

Skills:

- Led design system creation
- Mentored junior designers

UI Designer | Product Co | 2020-2022

BDes | NID Ahmedabad | 2020

Freshers | Computer Science Graduate
vikram.s@email.com | 8877665544

Seeking entry-level position to apply my programming skills and learn from experienced professionals.

B.Tech Computer Science | VIT Vellore | 2024
